data.title: Draymond Green Show - Baron Davis - The Draymond Green Show
data.meta_description:
Baron Davis joins ‘The Draymond Green Show’ to discuss growing up in Los Angeles, the Kendrick Lamar vs. Drake rap beef, why he chose UCLA over Duke, Coach K being a “hater,” the “We Believe” Golden State Warriors team, partying with Snoop Dogg, Donald Sterling’s Los Angeles Clippers, Jeremy Lin facing Kobe Bryant, and more.

0:00 Start
10:00 Kendrick vs. Drake
17:00 Coach K a 'hater'
30:00 The 'We Believe' Warriors
38:30 Partying with Snoop Dogg
48:00 Donald Sterling's Clippers
1:10:00 Linsanity

Produced by: Jackson Safon

#Volume #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
data.text:
Baron Davis joins ‘The Draymond Green Show’ to discuss growing up in Los Angeles, the Kendrick Lamar vs. Drake rap beef, why he chose UCLA over Duke, Coach K being a “hater,” the “We Believe” Golden State Warriors team, partying with Snoop Dogg, Donald Sterling’s Los Angeles Clippers, Jeremy Lin facing Kobe Bryant, and more.

0:00 Start

10:00 Kendrick vs. Drake

17:00 Coach K a "hater"

30:00 The "We Believe" Warriors

38:30 Partying with Snoop Dogg

48:00 Donald Sterling's Clippers

1:10:00 Linsanity

Produced by: Jackson Safon

#Volume #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

The Podium: An NBC Olympic and Paralympic podcast. Join us for insider coverage during the intense competition at the 2024 Paris Olympic and Paralympic Games. In the run-up to the Opening Ceremony, we’ll bring you deep into the stories and events that have you know and those you'll be hard-pressed to forget.

In The Village will take you into the most exclusive areas of the 2024 Paris Olympic Games to explore the daily life of athletes, complete with all the funny, mundane and unexpected things you learn off the field of play. Join Elizabeth Beisel as she sits down with Olympians each day in Paris.
